name: AutoChat
description: Next.js app using TypeScript, Shadcn UI, Drizzle ORM, and Zod. Project enforces strong coding standards and conventions.
instructions: If code generation involves authentication, use the custom tables and UI as defined in the project.
Use Tailwind CSS and Shadcn for all styling.
Before adding new components, check if shadcn has a component that can be used instead.
Always use TypeScript with strict settings.
When in doubt or when external documentation is needed, refer to perplexity-tool.mdc rules.
Don't ask for confirmation at the end; just proceed with the changes.
